page.title: 03Schools in our D-block
page.content: Education in our D-block consists of two{primary schools,}and{two nursery {schools.}The two primary schools are Shortlees and Bellfield. The former was{opened in 1952}and today, has a school population of{420.}Over and above the normal class activities Shortlees have many other interests including{badminton, table-tennis {ornothology, football and netball. {Bellfield Primary School}was opened in{1964}and today has a population of {348.}Like Shortlees, Bellfield offers interesting activities including{soft- {ball tennis, badminton, netball and {football. Bellfield Nursery School}was opened in{1969}and{Shortlees Nursery was opened in{1974.}These schools cater for children of{pre-school age with the emphasis on education through play.
